attributes.review: Ive had a bad experience from the moment I decided to download it. Not only did my parrot attack me merciless for making such a choice but to make matters worse HE ALSO BIT MY FINGER OFF?!?? The app took hours to download and when it finally did it wouldn't open up. I’m disappointed I wont able to see the patriotic NOT fake news has made this app number 1 for news. Anyways make america great again by getting rid of the orange peel. Dont 4get 2 rate!
attributes.title: Had high hopes

attributes.review: The app took an incredibly long time to load. It had unprofessional graphics, and was difficult to navigate. I was surprised to see how simplistic, amateur, and unpresidential the graphics were. It sent me hundreds of notifications, none of which were remotely informative. Overall, this is one of the worst campaign strategies he’s come up with. Hope something changes soon because this app is doomed without some sort of remodeling.
attributes.title: Sucky

attributes.review: This app took an eternity to download. I was very excited to get the app, so I can learn about upcoming events and all things Donald trump ❤️. However, every time I tried opening it the app would crash. It would also cause my phone to overheat and the battery drained. I’d try and try and try to open the app; because I’m a devoted trump supporter. So, you could only imagine how upset and saddened this made me. Please get this awful app off the App Store.
attributes.title: Not very good at all. Worst app ever.

attributes.review:
as a gen z member, i was completely terrified to open this app, but what made my experience even worse was that there was an ✨orange✨ man in the beginning, with an awfully large neck. imagine making an app dedicated to our disgrace of a president, who not only hid in a bunker because he was scared of riots, but is a white supremacists, homiphobic, islamiphobic, xenophobic, aniticematic, pro-life, and a murder, a murder at the least. big clown stuff right there😌😍🤡. now that this app has 1.2 reviews we just have to wait and see if it gets deleted, and if it does , maybe trump will feel bad for trying to ban tiktok. i wish i could rate this 0 stars but unfortunately i cant. you can't hide from us, gen z will take the government down.
-love maddie 🥰✨😌🧚🏻‍♀️😍😙💕💓
attributes.title: i hate this app✨🧚🏻‍♀️🥰

attributes.review: This app took two weeks to download, absolutely absurd. After it finally downloaded I realized that this app was to support some orange oompa loompa dude who is so racist, misogynistic, and a former rapist. I found the app totally impossible to navigate. The organization in the app itself is terrible and so hard to follow. I looked at the reviews after to realize that I was not the only one who was having trouble with this awful app. If I could rate this app zero starts I would.
attributes.title: Horrible✨🧚‍♀️💖💫😘

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the hype was all about when suddenly I got a notification about my information being stolen from me!!! This had never happened before I downloaded this app and honestly it has caused me so much trama. This app even started recording me in my PRIVATE TIME. This app even R*PED ME! I was sitting on my stool and all of a sudden my phone began shaking vigorously from notifications from this app. If I could rate this 0 stars I would. DO BOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
attributes.title: This app is STEALING MY INFORMATION!!!!!!😳😱🙊

attributes.review: So I went to get this app to see what the big deal abt it was and I was trying to download it but it refused to let me download when I finally did it lagged and gave my phone a bug so I had to get my phone fixed now idk if this has happend to any of you guys but I think the app did it to me cause I’m Mexican and It didn’t want a Mexican on the app I feel it’s best that we take the app down cause the App Store shouldn’t  support a app that’s bugged and racist in any way!.
attributes.title: Racist and bugged

attributes.review: So I downloaded this and all was well until I went to go eat so pizza. I sat down and my phone started talking to me. It’s said if you don’t support trump then they will kidnap me, Charli D’Amelio, Chase Hudson ,and Addison Rae. I was so scared . So I got my sister and told peppa pig and we got in our car and was backing out of the drive way . Then we see a trump face in the camera. So we didn’t know what to do. We called the police department and they came and killed peppa and made us eat her. I am so traumatized.
attributes.title: I HATE IT

attributes.review:
sup trump, i just wanted to let you know man. as our president of the US of A.... you stink man. like old white man sweat. i don’t know how if you literally don’t do anything all day. like cmon son take a shower. well anyways don’t delete tik tok. and if the secret service sees this. don’t come to my house. this review is not that serious or deep. just go ahead and hack my icloud and delete the review. don’t come to my house :/ anyways .... NOT trump 2020. 
                                          sincerely, your fellow           american
attributes.title: dear trump

attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever downloaded.  i regret even considering that i should have it.  as soon as i opened it my phone crashed and i could not open it no matter how hard i tried.  when i went to the apple store to get it fixed it blew up and i was holding it in my left hand so my hand was covered with 3rd degree burns.  the burns got infected and i had to go to the hospital and amputate my left hand.  my life will never be the same, every day i cry about not having a phone or left hand anymore.  it truly ruined my life.  since my phone blew up i am currently typing this review from my nintendo 3ds but i am afraid that as soon as i hit send my ds will crash too.  goodbye internet.  do not download this app
attributes.title: completely ruined my life
